pageTitle: Top Secret Mixed Mesh Bra | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Bottoms sold separately. Made in the USA. Hand wash. 88% nylon/12% elastane. Mesh panels add breathability to this sporty Top Secret bra. Double-layered. Elastic band. Description Top Secret Lingerie > Top Secret Clothing > Bras > Lingerie / Sleepwear > Clothing > video play
textAfterTable: Bra Fitting With a bra on, wrap a tape measure snugly, but not too tightly, around your rib cage, just below your bust line. This is your band size (US/UK sizing uses inches). Then, wrap the tape measure around the fullest part of your bust. If the difference is: 1" / 2.5cm your cup size is A 2" / 5cm your cup size is B 3" / 7.5cm your cup size is C 4" / 10cm your cup size is D Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer With five generations of apparel manufacturers in their family, sisters Andrea and Michelle Varat have continued to make fashion a family affair. Experience in fabric sourcing and marketing gave them the industry expertise to launch Top Secret: an intimates line with a "show, don’t tell" motto. Inspired by the practicality and stylish appeal of South American bandeau tops, Top Secret lingerie and apparel channels a similar ease, peppered with the color and movement of the designers' native Miami culture.
